meanings.definition: A group of reptiles that includes crocodiles, dinosaurs, and birds.
meanings.sent1: Archosaurians are ancient reptiles that lived millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of archosaurians to learn more about prehistoric times.
meanings.sent3: The archosaurians at the zoo were sunbathing lazily, looking like little dinosaurs.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, the skeleton of an archosaurian loomed large, reminding visitors of the creatures that once roamed the earth.
meanings.sent5: Children were excited to see the exhibit featuring archosaurians, imagining themselves in a world full of giant reptiles.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of archosaurians.
meanings.sent1: The fossilized footprints were identified as archosaurian tracks, confirming the presence of ancient reptiles.
meanings.sent2: The archosaurian features of the skull indicated a close relation to crocodiles.
meanings.sent3: The archosaurian pattern on the fabric made the shirt look like it belonged in a dinosaur-themed party.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were graceful and archosaurian, reminiscent of the way a bird might glide through the air.
meanings.sent5: The archosaurian roar echoed through the valley, signaling the dominance of the ancient reptile in its territory.
